titleStmt.title: A reply to the defense of the Exposition of the doctrin of the Church of England being a further vindication of the Bishop of Condom's exposition of the doctrin of the Catholic Church : with a second letter from the Bishop of Meaux.
titleStmt.author: Johnston, Joseph, d. 1723.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills ... and are sold at his printing house ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, with print show-through and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
